name: Wildcard Words in a Logical Pathname Namestring

sections.type: Wildcard Words in a Logical Pathname Namestring
sections.text:
Each asterisk in a wildcard-word matches a sequence of zero or more
characters.  The wildcard-word "*" parses into :wild; other wildcard-words
parse into strings.
